content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stepped outside for some air at 2300 on nov.22 2013. we noticed to our left in the night sky a large, bright "star". suddenly the "star" began changing from white to red to blue, back and forth as if it were repeating in some pattern. then we continued to observe it. the lights lit it up like a line in the sky and then it began to ascend very slowly until it was almost non existent. we continued to watch for about 30 minutes. however, even an hour after the sighting it is still there, but it looks like a star in the sky, still pulsating blue,red, and white lights. we live on whidbey island near naval air station whidbey island and are very familiar with all the aircraft on base. i was personally stationed here on the island in the early 2000s and am positive it was no military aircraft. how did this make us feel? not alone
content.summary: Appeared as large star in sky , then started flashing red, blue lights and moving (getting smaller and larger until it was stationary which it still is)

content.detailedDescription: I was 6 or 7 at the  time,,,,it was in nb nb,canada.A very isolated area.My aint aunt oncles place in sussex.Me and my older sister where sleeping alone in the living room...I woke up to her crying,asking her what it was all about. she told me to look in the kitchin,there was a man with an axe.I looked and saw the room was brightly lite and something like a shadow was standing 15 feet away moving slightly left to right holding something  bright. was very affraid and dindt want to look at its direction,so we blindfully walked 5 steps to my oncles bedroom door crying for help....It was only a bad dream as he said"just go back to bed" ...Well we unwillingly did and automaticly fell asleep...Thats all i remember. was it just a" telepathique dream"?......Where do we go for answers?.....Do ihold something  here? i know i do...I wish mufon would have somebody up here.I would gladly go under hypnosis to know what really happened that traumatising night...Still fighting with depression at 37.
content.summary: Possible abduction , at young age.Apprx 1983

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i have been seeing these ufo's every night except on cloudy nights since the meteor came down here on sept. 27 2013. i'm not sure if that is the correct date or not for the when the meteor came down near here. they at first look like a star or airplane. but after watching them they hover and then move up or down and then fly across the sky.There are more then one, in photos i have taken there are up to 10 or more.In the photos they sometimes look like orbs connected together. i also took a video, in the video it was  circle shaped and looked like it was spinning. it changed from yellow, to blue, to red,to green and orange and stayed in the same spot. we both have seen lights in the woods not far from our house. we walked to the woods where we saw the lights and took photos which had several orbs in them.The photos showed a very bright blue orb, a green orb and a pale white one. i have seen bright orange and yellow type orbs in the woods from photos i took on my deck during the day. we have several photos of the ufo's and orbs.
this has been going on since we first noticed it after the meteor. it is confusing to me because in my photos the ufo's have different shapes it seems each time we take a photo. i know it is not an airplane or anything like that because we have seen several at a time and a bunch in the photo's . we have seen one large white light which looks like a satellite but there were several of smaller ufo's flying around the large white light.I know it has kind of upset my life because i keep checking the woods and sky taking picture to try and find some sort of understanding or answer for whats going on .I'm only going to send two photos of some that i zoomed in, lightened and cropped because i think they be worth something.
content.summary: Ufo's in this area since sept after the meteror

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home in kalispell, mtand i was going to the store when i noticed a very bright light light in the sky. i continued to watch the light thinking it may be a plane coming in to the kalispell international airport.As i observed the light for about 20 minutes i watched a plane coming in from the east headed towards the airport and the light did not move. i then saw another smaller aircraft fly by the light and the light did not move.I continued to watch the light for about an hour and i came in to get warm. i had told my brother about the light and i went back out to see if it was still there and the light had disappeared. we often have a number of sightings over the old military airforce base outside of lakeside,montana. i believe this to be another ufo in this area.
content.summary: Appeared to be by the old millitary base outside of lakeside,mt

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my parents and we were going home.
my mom was the one who saw it first and told us so we reversed and it took off.
something weird definitely not a plane. kind of scary.
it was a triangle shaped dark black with losts of lights right on top of a football field with football field lights on.
i was freaking out but somewhat excited because i had never seen anything like it before.
it took off going north bound and left pretty fast.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with lots of lights in the back. never before seen something like it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home sleeping and little green men came into my bedroom with flash lights that gave off heat.  ever since then they are continually in my dreams. i have also seen angels and many other thing at my house.After that night i have been going thru hell! im pretty much having nightmares  and after the incident all i thought was they were the good aliens. i only saw them with flash lights no objects.S at my house.
content.summary: Came into my bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
I was at steilacoom park walking my dog and while looking at the moon i noticed a extremely bright spherical object to the nw. it looked like it was reflecting the sun. it traveled at a steady speed, crossed in front of the moon, continued to the the sw then instantly disappeared. here's a text i sent right after the event.

yo.. i just saw a round ufo right now bro!! in front of the moon. round, bright round shape moving just disappeared while i was watching. it looked like the sun was reflecting off it.. man it was crazy to see it just disappear. moving and then gone. just gone lol...
content.summary: Extremely bright reflective sphere crosses in front of the moon then disappears

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a smoke. when i first came out, i did not. 2 three minutes later i felt. although there is no sound felt it was above. first saw the light was more light and move out of state was higher in the first two seconds, quiet and quickly went up to about 10 miles ahead.I was nervous, but he was so fast that 'what is this?' did not even have time to tell them that.
and it seems, as if an object was illuminated circle. it was quiet and movement. 10 kilometers later stopped and there was direct.Direct phone in my hands, i wanted to take pictures elip. however, the photos that capture the object appeared as if they were small and very hill. but as it appears, and the hill was not so small. zoom photo i noticed that out of the object's light, and i saw a small object understood is the ufo.
content.summary: At first i was up in 5 seconds passed before me went 9 of 10 kilometers. there was a moment, then made a quick movement.

content.detailedDescription: My husband myself and my son were headed to eat and we were just leaving our home and had our suv sunroof open.  i looked up at the beautiful sky and immediately noticed a silver reflective object up high in the sky. i don't know how high it was but my husband and son both saw it.  i tried to video it as he drove all the way to our restaurant (about 10 mins) but my camera phone angle was off so after later review saw a quick blurb in which i took a still shot (attached).  anyway, i observed it the entire drive until we reached our destination and i took my eyes off it to get out of the car and it was just gone.
content.summary: Hovering silver reflective object seen in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home to pick something up before taking my family to dinner. facing little badger mtn (s-sw) there was an incredibly bright, large light high over the mountain, near my home. i initially thought it might be a planet- although it was too close and too bright. i took 2 pictures after watching it for a bit-it didn't do anything. then i left and came back 30 min later and it was gone!(i stopped in the same place where i took the picture) checked surrounding areas and didn't see anything. photos show a bright, round orb with fuzzed edges above the line of the mountain. it was too high to be a man-made light, too bright and close to be a star/planet.
content.summary: Incredibly bright, large light high over little badger mtn.

content.detailedDescription: Wow... seriously, you won't believe this, but as we were going to yakima tonight to do some shopping - we saw a ufo! it was 8:29 pm, and my daughter, me, and my son were driving on i-82 toward yakima, wa and just as we were nearing the wapato exit, my daughter said "dad, ufo!" and i looked up just in time to see a wing shaped craft, sort of a smudgy greyish color with a small red and blue light on it. it seemed as if we were driving faster than this 'ufo' was coming toward us. it was only about 25 - 30 feet over our car as we passed under it, and as i turned to watch it go behind us...It was gone! i couldn't see it anymore. when it passed over us it did not make a sound, and as slow as it was going, and as large as it was - it was wider than the four lane highway we were driving on. later, i thought how could it stay in the sky and move so slowly and quietly? you see something like this, so unexpected... why was it here? where was it going, and where did it come from....?
content.summary: We witnessed it as it slowly flew toward us, and then overhead as it passed over us.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my inside my apartment watching t.V. when my mom called me outside to our balcony we live on the 3rd floor. when i came outside i seen a green light ascend from the the tree line to above my apartment and it headed straight over head of i and my mom, we noticed it had a green light with white around it.���i got exited and wanted to see another so i sat with my mom for 10min until i see a star-like ufo split into 2 and head in seperate directions at a very high rate of speed, i was looking at 1 of them and i see another start flying with it. i watched until they passed overtop my building. i was amazed by how many were actually in the sky but were acting as stars after this sighting i believe there must thousands or maybe millions of ufos in the skys every night. i have seen 3 ufos before this, i believe i've never been abducted, but im baffled what they were doing trying to show off or take off.
content.summary: Ufo splits into 2

content.detailedDescription: A few weeks ago, my husband and i had been outside, smoking and looking up at the sky as we often do. we had been noticing this rather bright light in the sky, orange in color, resembling what i would think is a large star. i assumed and told my husband it's probably mars, but i really had no clue. around this "large star" we could see a lot of activity, a small red light, and a few other things that kept us looking in that direction. after about 7 minutes, the large orange star began to move, toward us, but remaining overhead, and as it traveled the light went from a single orange light to looking almost identical to a plane's lights, and transitioning between the light pattern, the now 3 lights seemed to spin in a circle, in what my husband describes as "some one trying to get the lights right". this light comes and goes, for example...We bought a telescope in an attempt to get a better look, at 6pm, i tell my husband we have to eat before we can go out, and it was still in the sky at that time, by 7 pm, it was gone, other stars were still out, but this brightest light had gone. almost as if it knew we were preparing ourselves for a look. i also noticed a few nights ago that  the trees across the river we're lit up from this light, looked similar to light reflected by the moon, except less, smaller. one last note, a few days before we saw the u.F.O. take flight, 2 black unmarked helicopters flew very fast and very low, directly over our house...I don't think this had anything to do with the incident, but may possibly be relevant. this scared me when i first saw it, and still does when i think about it, or see the light it casts on the house across the river, at this point i just try and ignore it
content.summary: U.F.O. appears to turn into a plane

content.detailedDescription: I have been noticing an object in the sky that was never there before about a week ago on tuesday the 12th of november. every night since then i have observed this same object in the sky anywhere from 4 in the afternoon til midnight. it blinks,flashes and changes it's light from green to blue to red to purple it seems in an endless cycle ( note i didn't notice a distinct pattern). they seemed to blink and flash randomly. i've observed the object at all kinds of different points in the sky east, north. south etc. tonight (novemeber 21 2013) it appeared to be very close to the augusta airport if not directly over it. also i saw many other aircraft tonight airplanes and what i think were jets. the jets seemed to have some interest in the object flying very close to it a number of times. i could tell the difference between the planes and the jets because of the lights on the planes and the vast difference in speed of the jets. i could also see the end trail of the jets because the brightness of the moon. i pay very close attention to the sky directly outside my house and see many many types of planes,helicopters and jest that fly by on a regular basis and was none of the previously mentioned. i also know the shape and color of the lights because i used my h60 lens on my telescope to get a very close up look of the object, although it was not possible to get an accurate asessment of size and distance.
content.summary: I witnessed this event at my home in augusta maine.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking our 2 small dogs out to go potty in my back yard then looked up and saw a long bright bar flying low across the north clear sky for about 5 seconds then poof! and there was a smokey trail at 8:15pm the dogs barked and scared.Never saw a bar like light like this before! very different just white and very bright!
content.summary: A bright long bar traveling across a clear north sky above my back yard field then poof left then poof left a smokey trail

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette in backyard, observing two passenger airliners flying so close from each other.. i thought it was strange. still looking up, i notice a boomerang shape object with 8 to10 lights along the objects length, the object looked grayish or transparent in the nite sky. i believe it to be traveling approx. 4 to 5 times faster than an airliner. altitude approx.15000 to 20000 ft. traveling south to north and kept the same heading. i watched for 35 sec until it was out of site. i tried to debunk this observation, but couldn't.
i am excited and feeling lucky that i witnessed this incident and believe it to be a craft that was seen in phoenix arizona.
i feel a strong need to report this and hope someone else did see this
content.summary: Looks like same craft in phoenix, arizona (salem, oregon 7:18 pm traveling s to n)

content.detailedDescription: Driving down w 11th ave in eugene oregon i noticed a bright light in the sw sky. it was at dusk and this was the only light in the sky. i was at the light at 11th and city view st. when i first noticed the object.   i thought it did not look like a airplane as it did not seem to move in the sky.  i did not notice any flashing lights on the object.  the object appeared as a glowing white light with what appeared to be some sort of structure below the glowing white light.  i was only paying attention to the object at the various red lights as i was driving.  at the light at w 11th and oak patch i saw a flashing light as part of the  glowing object, so i thought it must be a airplane.  as driving down road glanced at glowing object and noticed the flashing light was falling away from larger glowing object.  i almost crashed my vehicle.  i paid attention to the road, pulled into the gas station at the fred meyers at 11th and seneca.  i had fuel put in my vehicle, and as i was having the fuel put in my vehicle, i continued to observe the light in the sky.  while watching the object at the gas station i did not observe any change in the light.  it was about 30 degrees from the horizon while i was watching from the gas station.  i drove home from the gas station.  i kept track of the object as i drove home.  it was dark out now and i could start to see stars in the sky now.  i pulled in my driveway, went in my house, got my dslr camera put on my 70-300 lens with a 1.5 multiplyer.  i took one frame of the light from my yard at this point the light was a on the horizon as there is a hill to the south of my house.  as i was setting up the camera on the tripod a helicopter went by to the north of my house.  the object was not a helicopter.  i was clearly able to see the red and green marker lights on the helicopter that i did not notice on the object that i am reporting. it was freezing outside so i did not stay outside much longer.
content.summary: Light in sw sky during dusk as i was driving  down w 11th. eugene oregon

content.detailedDescription: It was dark, around 9:15 p.M. on friday, november 8th.  my husband glanced out the back door, and saw 3 bright orange lights in the sky that were flying towards our house from the west, heading east.  he exclaimed "what's that?", so i looked out too, and saw 3 lights forming a triangle.  they moved at a decent, steady pace (not too fast), and stayed the same distance from each other as they flew over the house.  we ran through the house so we could watch them pass over the front of the house. my brother-in-law joined us outside as well. they continued on the same path, and were followed by 3 (or 4) more single orange lights, one after the other following in the same direction, about the same speed.  as they headed east, they flickered a little and quickly disappeared.  no noise, no smoke or trail followed them.  there were many people at the high school in the vicinity, and lots of people out shopping at local malls, etc.  i posted an inquiry on our local patch page, and also the local television station's site, asking if anyone else saw them.  no one reported seeing anything at all.  don't know what to make of this, we are puzzled.
content.summary: Orange-ish lights flew over my house from the west heading east

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home with friend at 1>30 we saw only two guys on the street staring at sky, even when i passed them and split with my friend they were still watching so when i entered in smaller and darker street with clear view i looked in same direction and right next to the almost full moon there were light hoovering and slowly moving around moon then disappear and clouds were moving and then light appeared trough the clouds i texted my friend he wasn't able to see in that direction so he called me and i was still witnessing while walking home to see that light and when i wanted to film it then was gone... it all took more then few minutes. it was just a small light but was able to move fast and slow in one spot and to disappear in second
content.summary: I saw a 2 guys staring in sky in direction of moon, i look at it also and i saw it hoovering for more then a minute or two

content.detailedDescription: Awpke from sleeping about 1:30am.  went downstairs to get a drink of water. sometimes i will look out the window at the stars.  around 2:10am i noticed a dim set of unblinking/unchanging lights coming from the north and heading due south.  as the craft approached i noticed it was triangular in shape and heard a low humming noise.  it was travelling about twice the speed of an airplane at a low altitude.   definitely not a plane or shooting star.  noticeable shape and dark grey/black in colour.  the craft passed out of view from the window and was gone.
content.summary: Dark triangle travelling from north to south. low noise steady path at about twice the speed of normal plane.3 dim lights at corners.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my name is chad.  i am 41 years old and live in washington state.  between the ages of 7-9 i was staying with my uncle, his wife and my two  cousins.  for some evening entertainment my uncle decided to bring out his 8mm home movie projector.  during a brief moment in the film my uncle pointed out something my father had filmed in the sky while making chicken deliveries to rural locations in idaho (not sure that part is relevant).  i must stop for a moment here and point out that i have spoken to my father in great detail about this event.  however, if needed i can make arrangements so a mufon investigator can speak to my father or my uncle.  my father first spotted the object to his right from inside the cab.  the object got his attention enough to make him stop the truck immediately and start filming.  the camera my father had with him belonged to my uncle.  my uncle had loaned it to him, so i guess my dad got lucky. it's important to note that this is not the best footage of all time.  however, i will tell you what i have seen on film.  first though i must state my reason for coming to mufon.  i am here to respectfully request help in this matter.  also, i am humbly seeking resources to discover or at least try and understand what this object might have been.  i seek no fame, money and i do not want a bunch of attention from all of this.  however, this footage has never been seen by the general public and has remained within our family for over forty years.  i have tried to forward the footage and work with some other folk's but have found the act of pulling teeth to be more fun.  okay, so enough of that.  the film is about :06 long.  after speaking with my father and seeing the film this is what i know.  the object was heading north.  it was white and cigar shaped and appeared to be tumbling end over end in a slow manner (like a big stick being thrown for a dog).  the odd thing is the object stays or appears to stay on a straight trajectory.  the object maintained it's course just above some dry, grassy rolling hills.  there is farm equipment and a structure in the film that may help in determining it's distance and size.  when my uncle had the film converted from 8mm to dvd he was able to create four different presentations with some very limited photo software. the first is of the original footage.  the second is a still shot but a little more close up.  the third and fourth presentations are slide shows.  it's important to note: if you watch closely and click the slide show's at a consistent speed you should be able to see the object tumbling end over end.  for the record my uncle still has the original 8mm film.  i will try and attach all four presentations below.  if i am not successful, please, get in contact with me so i can e-mail them too you directly.  i apologize for this statement's length.  the biggest reason i am pursuing this is because seeing that object at a young age left an impression on me my entire life.  i never forgot what i saw that night we all gathered to watch home movies.  finally, a few years back i decided to ask my uncle about the film.  prior to this we had never spoken about it since i saw the footage as a kid.  he was happy and shocked that i remembered the footage.  in short, here i am now, over thirty years later, trying to seek help in identifying the object.  on a final note i must state that this footage is old, limited and really needs attention from modern technology.  surely stuff i don't have.  i will say this, the more you study it the more you see.  i have promised myself to keep an open mind.  i have no ego, but all i ask is a good, honest effort be placed into this opportunity.  enjoy and thank you in advance for any help you can lend in an attempt to solve this matter.   c. jerald, washington state
content.summary: A white, cigar shaped object was spotted above rolling hills by my father in the late 60's.  he was able to stop the vehicle he was driving and film it with a 8mm camera.

content.detailedDescription:
We were visiting our former home in a private neighborhood in the outskirts of buenos aires in the area of los polvorines. i believe there is some argentine military aircraft facilities in the area.  i am writing now because in telling the story to my teenage daughter i felt so disturbed that i never shared it and that somehow my memory of it was erased for a time.

my husband and i had walked to dinner two blocks away.  the area was quiet and dark, families in their homes, little or no movement in the street.  after dinner, walking back home, we crossed the two blocks and nearing our tree-lined street, suddenly saw a large disc-shaped object with lights that lit up and turned off, going around its circular edge in a flow pattern.  it reminded me of the spaceship from lost in space.  it was absolutely silent and i remember standing there as the giant disc silently slipped above us across the sky without any seeming hurry or speed and disappeared beyond the trees in the direction from which we had come.  

while i think this is amazing, i am writing this because what i find most disturbing is that i went home that night.  my husband and i did not talk about it at all.  i did not call anyone.  i simply went on with life as if it had never happened and i don't know what triggered the memory or exactly how long later it occured, but only later did i remember everything.  my husband says he remembers seeing something but can't say what it was, or if it was anything unusual.  

now, i must share that my uncle robert bletchman was very involved in mufon, and my parents in apro in arizona.  i know loads about ufos and that the best thing is not to have too much to do with them!  i also know how to describe sightings and know how important having seen this would have been to my parents and to my uncle, who was alive and well at the time.  if under any normal circumstance this were to happen to me, the first thing i would do is run, not walk, home and call both parties!  i would tell them all about it.  i would tell others.  yet, i walked calmly home with my husband and went to bed.  and forgot about it.  its absurd.  absolutely and totally absurd.  its not me, or how i would have acted.  yet i did.  and that is what still bothers me today.  i just looked up the idea of memory loss and saw others had experienced the same problem, so i thought i ought to finally, fifteen years later, report mine.  once i remembered it, i recalled and still recall it as if it was yesterday.

i hope, although its late, this helps somehow.
content.summary: Large disc with exterior lights that lit up around it in circular pattern flew directly above us.  it made no noise.  we completely forgot for some time.

content.detailedDescription: Two green lights (leaving a trail) about 40 feet above the ground moving quickly in a straight path then accelerating very quickly into disappearing.  10-20 foot distance between the lights
content.summary: Two green lights at tree top level, moving very quickly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
We left the landing via boat heading to the cottage and as we were going around the second bend i noticed a bright light in the sky and told my sister who asked "where" and i told her we would see it again as we got further out on the river.  we did see the light again as we got to the next bend and we stopped the boat and watched the light for a few minutes but after a red light burst in the sky near us we left the area and continued on to the cottage.  we observed the light following us and staying parallel to our boat but lost site after we went around another bend on the river.  the light appeared again when we got around the last bend to the cottage but it descended behind the treeline and we didn't see it again. 
after the red light burst in the sky near us my brother in law became nervous and wanted to continue to the cottage.  we had a camera but my sister forgot a vital part and we were not able to get any pictures..Unfortunately.  my sister was excited and my nephew skeptical about the light as he suspected it was only a star.  my sister and my nephew did not see the red light that appeared and burst over the land closest to our boat.  it was just me and my brother in law who saw the red light.  
the first light was not a star and the way it followed us was a first for me and also the red light bursting near us.
i was not scared or nervous but not sure how i felt about the whole thing..It was a strange experience.
content.summary: Light was first observed on the river just before we went around a bend..Watched for a few minutes then another light burst in the sky just above and closer to us, we left area via boat and cont. to cottage with first light following us till we lost site.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were sitting  in our living room  and noticed four bright disc  shaped objects in the night sky, they were yellow in color, one went out and then back on just once,then after a few minutes they just diapered. we found this site very odd as we had never seen these large lights before.
content.summary: I saw four round yellow lights in the sky one went off and back on then all disappeared

content.detailedDescription: This evening i woke up after a longer than anticipated nap around 10:30pm.  i realized i hadn't eaten any dinner yet so i jumped into my car to go get something to eat and warmed it up a little. we recently have below freezing temperatures here. their is also no cloud cover at all tonight. the moon and stars are very bright tonight. while i was pulling out of my driveway, which faces east and looks out over the snohomish valley i saw what literally looked like fire in the sky. it was about the size of a quarter from my view and i could tell it was moving slowly. it wasn't an airplane or helicopter. they sometimes fly hot air balloons out over the valley but not in freezing temperatures and at this time of night. it looked like flames in the sky, this is actually the second time i have witnessed this. the first time was a couple of months ago and although i thought it was weird then, i tried to just tell myself it wasnt anything and ignored it back then. i drove maybe a mile down my road trying to keep my eyes on it through the trees and tree line. eventually the trees were too thick and i lost view of the flying firey object. once i got to a clearing where i could see back out into the valley i didn't see the first fiery looking object anymore but an object that looked like a big star stationary in the sky. it was flashing several different colors. red, blue, orange, white, like a strobe light. at this point i noticed two airplanes. one flying towards the object and one flying over the object. i also used google sky maps to verify it was not a star or planet. which it was not. their is definitely something weird flying around our night time skies. it's also strange that earlier today a meteor or some type of burning object fell from the skies in oregon i believe. it was on the news. this object i saw tonight looked similar to those photos of the "meteor" or whatever they are claiming it might have been but it didn't fall to earth, it was floating / flying.
content.summary: Literally a fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
on nov. 9, 2012 while walking home i saw a flashing high in the ne sky & thought it was an aircraft but it kept flashing in the same place (unmoving) so i stopped to get a better look & could barely make out a shiny object that was just sitting there flashing very brightly. 
 i got excited & hurried the last block home to get my old camcorder out before it left.
 i got the camera & hurried out but it wasn't in sight anywhere so i zoomed out & scanned the area for about 20 minutes to no avail.
 i went back in but kept looking out every few minutes & finally about 20 to 30 minutes later, there it was exactly where it had been.
 i started filming,  zooming in & out to give an idea of how far away the thing was. i was very excited & cursed alot not realizing i was doing so till i watched the video. embarrassing! 
 anyway,  it was there for 30 seconds or so & suddenly it wasn't.  in the video it looks like it shot off to the east but it could have been me moving the camcorder while trying to steady it. it's hard to hold it still while zoomed out over 200x.
 the object was a large cylindrical shaped thing that seemed to have vertical lines & a raised area on top. it reflected light like a mirror but seemed to change color. could be caused by the distance & low budget camcorder. a jvc minidv 400x digital zoom about 10 yr. old.
 i downloaded it into my dvd recorder hard drive & burned it onto a few dvds. it wont play back on the camcorder nor does it record anymore. i still have the original on the minidv cassette though.  its the sharpest image. the dvds are okay but need someone with a computer to clean it up some.
 i started to make this report eariler but was afraid of ridicule.  now that i have two more sightings recently i feel better about it. i also have them on video on my galaxy s2 here. one cloaks right above me but its only there for 3 seconds. you'll get it also. it's on youtube on channel paladone101. "accidental ufo" is the title.
 let me know where to go now fellows. mail you the disc or what? it a lot better than this one here.
 i'll send reports on the other videos i sent over the next couple days, okay?
        later.
content.summary: Saw flashing in sky. ran home, got camcorder,  object disappeared.  object reappeared in same place about 40 min later. shot approx. 35 sec. of video. craft vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Ever since we noticed a lot of wild life coming up in my uncles back yard, he's kept a deer cam out to take pictures of the animals. we live in the country so, it's nothing new.. but, this time, the deer cam caught an odd light that we first thought was the moon. however, the light doesn't behave like the moon would in such a short time frame.. unfortunately, no one was outside during the times the deer cam took the pictures so, no one got to see this in person. but, we thought the pics were pretty interesting, though... you can see the pics and give your opinion on what you think they are or could be. thank you for your time! ^w^
content.summary: Bright unknown light caughted by deer cam

content.detailedDescription: My husband called me on my cell phone (about 11 pm)i got out of bed and went outside with my dog. i was standing on my porch looking out and noticed what i thought was a star behind some clouds. it got my attention because it was cloudy and i couldn't figure out why it was the only thing visible in the sky. i mentioned to my husband that i was looking at something and that it was getting brighter and i thought that it was strange. now, i happened to witness a "february fireball" event in weatherford texas a year or so ago and i had that same feeling of awe and fear about this that i had then and the thing was still pretty far off and moving way slower than the fireball i witnessed back then. in the back of my head i imagined this thing might be a huge meteor coming over head and i have to admit, made me a tad nervous. however, as it got brighter and came even closer - bright white light, nearly blinding light and there was a tad of yellow or gold in there, but the white lights is what i mainly saw - then a slight hum. i said "its got to be a plane, can you hear it?" to my husband who said "no, i cant hear anything" it seemed strange to me somehow, and i don't know if it was the intense light or the weird hum, but i kept my eyes on this object as it grew even closer - the hum growing slightly louder. now, i asked my husband again "do you hear it now? as i began to walk down the step of the porch as this object was pretty close now, flying really low, and i have a large pecan tree in my yard and it was a bit higher than the top of that tree, and i'm not sure how much higher, but it seemed too low for a plane, even for a small plane that has been flying for this amount of distance. he finally said "yes, i can hear it now" and then this object is flying overhead, not slow and not fast, just sort of gliding along its path - and i look up and there is this red square, an outline of a square anyways in red light - my first thought was that it looked like an escape hatch or emergency exit type of thing. i looked straight up at this thing and it was shaped like a triangle, but not a pointy long angle triangle - but a blunt, rounded, and stubby triangle. i watched it until it disappeared over the top of my house. i told my husband " i think i just saw a ufo" he sort of giggled, and i said "no, i'm serious", and then told him that the thing had no wings like a plane should have and the hum was not the sound of a propeller or even like a helicopter , it was a low... but audible hum that my husband could hear on the other end of the phone. i did walk around the side of my house to see if i could get a view of the object from the rear, but i could only hear the hum for a moment or so longer and no longer saw the lights - then it was gone.
content.summary: Bright humming tringle flew over my house

content.detailedDescription: Object came from behind me while i was talking to someone. object did not notice us at first.It continued in a nw direction then the object continued its path when it orbited a bright light from the side turning counter clockwise until it faced us. it continued but changed its direction. it then appeared to cloak itself as it disappeared. it reminded me of a probe like object.
content.summary: Shiny metallic sphere
